scripts.text:
-- =========================================
-- ADF Script Activity: DW Loads (PET project)
-- =========================================
USE WAREHOUSE PET_WH;
USE DATABASE  PET_LICENSE_DB;

-- =========================================
-- 1) LOCATION_DIM upsert (deduped on NK_HASH)
-- =========================================
MERGE INTO DW.LOCATION_DIM D
USING (
  WITH src AS (
    SELECT
      UPPER(TRIM(ZIP_CODE))  AS ZIP_N,
      UPPER(TRIM(CITY_NAME)) AS CITY_N,
      IFF(STATE_CODE IS NULL OR TRIM(STATE_CODE) = '',
          'WA',
          UPPER(SUBSTR(TRIM(STATE_CODE), 1, 2))
      ) AS STATE_N,
      'USA' AS COUNTRY_N,
      MD5(
        UPPER(TRIM(ZIP_CODE)) || '|' ||
        UPPER(TRIM(CITY_NAME)) || '|' ||
        IFF(STATE_CODE IS NULL OR TRIM(STATE_CODE) = '',
            'WA',
            UPPER(SUBSTR(TRIM(STATE_CODE), 1, 2))
        )
      ) AS NK_HASH
    FROM STAGE.STG_LOCATION_LKP
    WHERE ZIP_CODE IS NOT NULL
  ),
  dedup AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM src
    QUALIFY ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY NK_HASH ORDER BY ZIP_N, CITY_N, STATE_N) = 1
  )
  SELECT * FROM dedup
) S
ON D.NATURAL_KEY_HASH = S.NK_HASH
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
  D.ZIP_CODE      = S.ZIP_N,
  D.CITY_NAME     = S.CITY_N,
  D.STATE_CODE    = S.STATE_N,
  D.COUNTRY_CODE  = S.COUNTRY_N
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT
  (ZIP_CODE, CITY_NAME, STATE_CODE, COUNTRY_CODE, NATURAL_KEY_HASH)
VALUES
  (S.ZIP_N, S.CITY_N, S.STATE_N, S.COUNTRY_N, S.NK_HASH);

-- =========================================
-- 2) BREED_DIM upsert (deduped on NK_HASH)
-- =========================================
MERGE INTO DW.BREED_DIM D
USING (
  WITH src AS (
    SELECT
      UPPER(TRIM(SPECIES))        AS SPEC_N,
      UPPER(TRIM(PRIMARY_BREED))  AS PB_N,
      IFF(SECONDARY_BREED IS NULL OR TRIM(SECONDARY_BREED) = '',
          'UNKNOWN', UPPER(TRIM(SECONDARY_BREED))) AS SB_N,
      MD5(
        UPPER(TRIM(SPECIES)) || '|' ||
        UPPER(TRIM(PRIMARY_BREED)) || '|' ||
        IFF(SECONDARY_BREED IS NULL OR TRIM(SECONDARY_BREED) = '',
            'UNKNOWN', UPPER(TRIM(SECONDARY_BREED)))
      ) AS NK_HASH
    FROM STAGE.STG_PET_LICENSE
  ),
  dedup AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM src
    QUALIFY ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY NK_HASH ORDER BY SPEC_N, PB_N, SB_N) = 1
  )
  SELECT * FROM dedup
) S
ON D.NATURAL_KEY_HASH = S.NK_HASH
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
  D.SPECIES_NAME    = S.SPEC_N,
  D.PRIMARY_BREED   = S.PB_N,
  D.SECONDARY_BREED = S.SB_N
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT
  (SPECIES_NAME, PRIMARY_BREED, SECONDARY_BREED, NATURAL_KEY_HASH)
VALUES
  (S.SPEC_N, S.PB_N, S.SB_N, S.NK_HASH);

-- =========================================
-- 3) DATE_DIM upsert (robust parser, deduped)
-- =========================================
MERGE INTO DW.DATE_DIM T
USING (
  WITH parsed AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT
      COALESCE(
        TRY_TO_DATE(TRIM(LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE), 'MM/DD/YYYY'),
        TRY_TO_DATE(TRIM(LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD'),
        TRY_TO_DATE(TRIM(LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE), 'YYYY/MM/DD'),
        TRY_TO_DATE(TRIM(LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE), 'Mon DD, YYYY'),
        TRY_TO_DATE(TRIM(LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE), 'Month DD, YYYY'),
        TRY_TO_DATE(TRIM(LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE), 'DD-Mon-YYYY'),
        TRY_TO_DATE(TRIM(LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE), 'DD-MON-YYYY')
      ) AS D
    FROM STAGE.STG_PET_LICENSE
    WHERE LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE IS NOT NULL
  ),
  dedup AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM parsed
    WHERE D IS NOT NULL
    QUALIFY ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY D ORDER BY D) = 1
  )
  SELECT
    TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(D, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS DATE_KEY,
    D                                 AS FULL_DATE,
    YEAR(D)                           AS YEAR_NUM,
    QUARTER(D)                        AS QUARTER_NUM,
    MONTH(D)                          AS MONTH_NUM,
    TRIM(TO_CHAR(D, 'Month'))         AS MONTH_NAME,
    DAY(D)                            AS DAY_NUM
  FROM dedup
) S
ON T.DATE_KEY = S.DATE_KEY
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
  T.FULL_DATE   = S.FULL_DATE,
  T.YEAR_NUM    = S.YEAR_NUM,
  T.QUARTER_NUM = S.QUARTER_NUM,
  T.MONTH_NUM   = S.MONTH_NUM,
  T.MONTH_NAME  = S.MONTH_NAME,
  T.DAY_NUM     = S.DAY_NUM
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT
  (DATE_KEY, FULL_DATE, YEAR_NUM, QUARTER_NUM, MONTH_NUM, MONTH_NAME, DAY_NUM)
VALUES
  (S.DATE_KEY, S.FULL_DATE, S.YEAR_NUM, S.QUARTER_NUM, S.MONTH_NUM, S.MONTH_NAME, S.DAY_NUM);

-- =========================================
-- 4) FACT MERGE (robust date parse; joins to deduped dims)
-- =========================================
MERGE INTO DW.PETLICENSE_FACT F
USING (
  WITH staged AS (
    SELECT
      LICENSE_NUMBER,
      ANIMAL_NAME,
      COALESCE(
        TRY_TO_DATE(TRIM(LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE), 'MM/DD/YYYY'),
        TRY_TO_DATE(TRIM(LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD'),
        TRY_TO_DATE(TRIM(LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE), 'YYYY/MM/DD'),
        TRY_TO_DATE(TRIM(LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE), 'Mon DD, YYYY'),
        TRY_TO_DATE(TRIM(LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE), 'Month DD, YYYY'),
        TRY_TO_DATE(TRIM(LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE), 'DD-Mon-YYYY'),
        TRY_TO_DATE(TRIM(LICENSE_ISSUE_DATE), 'DD-MON-YYYY')
      ) AS ISSUE_DT,
      UPPER(TRIM(ZIP_CODE)) AS ZIP_N,
      MD5(
        UPPER(TRIM(SPECIES)) || '|' ||
        UPPER(TRIM(PRIMARY_BREED)) || '|' ||
        IFF(SECONDARY_BREED IS NULL OR TRIM(SECONDARY_BREED) = '',
            'UNKNOWN', UPPER(TRIM(SECONDARY_BREED)))
      ) AS BREED_HASH
    FROM STAGE.STG_PET_LICENSE
    WHERE LICENSE_NUMBER IS NOT NULL
  ),
  valid AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM staged
    WHERE ISSUE_DT IS NOT NULL
  )
  SELECT
    v.LICENSE_NUMBER,
    v.ANIMAL_NAME,
    TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(v.ISSUE_DT, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS DATE_KEY,
    l2.LOCATION_DIM_KEY,
    b.BREED_DIM_KEY,
    1 AS CNT
  FROM valid v
  JOIN DW.LOCATION_DIM l2
    ON v.ZIP_N = UPPER(TRIM(l2.ZIP_CODE))
  JOIN DW.BREED_DIM b
    ON v.BREED_HASH = b.NATURAL_KEY_HASH
) S
ON F.LICENSE_ID = S.LICENSE_NUMBER
   AND F.DATE_KEY = S.DATE_KEY
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
  F.LOCATION_DIM_KEY = S.LOCATION_DIM_KEY,
  F.BREED_DIM_KEY    = S.BREED_DIM_KEY,
  F.PET_NAME         = S.ANIMAL_NAME,
  F.CNT              = S.CNT
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT
  (DATE_KEY, LOCATION_DIM_KEY, BREED_DIM_KEY, LICENSE_ID, PET_NAME, CNT)
VALUES
  (S.DATE_KEY, S.LOCATION_DIM_KEY, S.BREED_DIM_KEY, S.LICENSE_NUMBER, S.ANIMAL_NAME, S.CNT);
